page.title: 17BUCCLEUCH ESTATES- LANGHOLM
page.content: THE MAJOR{LANDOWNER}IN LANGHOLM IS THE {DUKE OF BUCCLEUCH AND QUEENSBERRY. } THE BUCCLEUCH FAMILY HAS OWNED AND ADMINISTERED THE LAND FOR HUNDREDS OF YEARS. THE DUKE DOES NOT HAVE A RESIDENCE IN LANGHOLM BUT ONE OF THE MAIN ESTATE OFFICES IS HERE. EVIDENCE OF THE INFLUENCE OF THE BUCCLEUCH'S CAN BE SEEN IN THE {STREET NAMES OF {LANGHOLM,}MANY BEING NAMED AFTER { {BUCCLEUCH CHILDREN.}BUCCLEUCH ESTATES OWNS FARMLAND WHICH IS TENANTED BY {HILL SHEEP FARMERS.}THE MOORLAND IS MAINTAINED FOR{GROUSE SHOOTING}BUT LOCALS ARE GRANTED THE RIGHT TO {CUT {PEAT.}THE ESTATE OWNS HOUSES IN BOTH THE TOWN AND COUNTRY.THESE HOUSES ARE LET TO ESTATE WORKERS AND LOCALS.SOME OF THE COTTAGES ARE KEPT AS HOLIDAY HOMES.THERE ARE SMALL SOFTWOOD FOREST PLANTATIONS AND BUCCLEUCH ESTATES OWNS THE{FISHING RIGHTS}ON THE RIVERS.
